subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Radio Shack Model 12-469: Used it for the first time today
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1204824231
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Mike,
 
I am sure there are enough of us here that will help you out with the  file.  
You can send it to any of us and we would run it thru our software  for you 
and send it back to you in bits and pieces.  I would also recommend  cool edit 
2.1 for editing the software.  It works great.....
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 3/6/2008 8:39:40 A.M. Central Standard Time,  
f1cracker75@... writes:

 
 
 
I used my 12-469 for the first time this morning, and ran a 4 minute tape  
session. One of the questions I asked was, "When a person dies, do they see a  
white light?"  After I asked this question the second time, I got a very  
distinct and crisp YES.  How can I save just that section of the file? Do  I need 
to do that in the recorder, or can I do it in the .wave file I now have  saved 
on my computer of the whole recording.
 
Mike Edwards Cary, NC
